title: 172: Intro to the Epics
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The Iliad, Odyssey, and Aeneid are all part of one story. That story was common knowledge for the Greeks, but mostly unknown to us moderns. This episode is that story, giving the context necessary for understanding the Iliad, which begins in the middle of things.
itunes:author: Homer, Virgil, and Dante
itunes:subtitle: Because 20 minutes just isn't good enough.
itunes:summary: The Iliad, Odyssey, and Aeneid are all part of one story. That story was common knowledge for the Greeks, but mostly unknown to us moderns. This episode is that story, giving the context necessary for understanding the Iliad, which begins in the middle of things.
itunes:title: 172: Intro to the Epics
